page.title: 18LEISURE AND AMENITIES
page.content: The area of{Eston Hills}is used by many people in their{free time.}Some people go{climbing}on the rocks underneath the Nab.{Hikers}go walking on the hills.Some people try to{keep {fit}and go for a{jog}to the Nab and back.People may go for a{picnic}or go {camping.}Children go to play games.Boys on bikes go{scrambling. Some people go{horse riding}with the nearby riding school. In winter people go{sledging}down banks,jumping over hills,falling over and having fun in the snow. People might go up the hills to{watch {animals}and{birds}or to look at {frogs, tadpoles}and{newts}in the ponds. People go up the hills to{think things over.
